messages.subject: Re: Re: Burai images
messages.msgSnippet: ... http://www.mindspring.com/~sherlgirl/burai/burai-vol001.jpg The man in white robe is Serizawa Kamo and the man in black is Niimi Nishiki (VERY suspiciously
messages.messageBody:
> Date: Fri, 24 Dec 2004 09:45:42 -0500
> From: BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@...>
> Subject: Re: Burai images
>
> Thank you Sherl!!
> One question--who is the hot number all in black in
> the background of
> this one?
>
http://www.mindspring.com/~sherlgirl/burai/burai-vol001.jpg


The man in white robe is Serizawa Kamo and the man in
black is Niimi Nishiki (VERY suspiciously like Saito
Hajime in RuroKen)

And a much belated Merry Christmas and a Happy New
Year to all ^^ Didn't have access to the Net while I
was in Kobe and am just checking my mails here in
Hiroshima.




=====
Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

(Fate/Stay Night)

messages.subject: Burai images
messages.msgSnippet: My thanks to Tama for helping me get through the process of ordering. I m temporarily putting these up, and hajimenokizu has agreed to more permanently host
messages.messageBody:
My thanks to Tama for helping me get through the process of ordering.

I'm temporarily putting these up, and hajimenokizu has agreed to more permanently host these.

http://www.mindspring.com/~sherlgirl/burai/
(covers for series 1, volumes 1-5, as well as backs. and cover for series 2, volume 1)

If all goes well, second set arrives early January and we'll have more to share.

S

messages.subject: Crossing paths NEW INFO
messages.msgSnippet: From http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/nenpyou.html 1875 (Meiji 8) June 1: Souma Katsu (Saitou s older sister) dies. Same day, NAGAKURA, SAITOU, and MATSUMOTO
messages.messageBody:
From http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/nenpyou.html

"1875 (Meiji 8) June 1: Souma Katsu (Saitou's older sister) dies. Same day,
NAGAKURA, SAITOU, and MATSUMOTO RYOUJUN MEET AND ERECT TOMBSTONES FOR KONDOU
AND HIJIKATA."

*picks self up from floor*

--M.
